name: Folded Fortunes (Teaser)
description:
This is a teaser for a larger project I am working on called Folded Fortunes. 

The full Folded Fortunes game will be coming-of-age-narrative game with a custom textile game controller. The game's branching narrative will be determined by choices the main character makes with her cootie catcher.

This teaser provides a small look into the world where Folded Fortunes is set, and introduces some of the characters. 

This teaser was made using Twine.
